record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Baseball Team that toured Japan, autumn 1910: fifth row: R. W. Baird; fourth row: J. B. Boyle and H. J. Ehrhorn; third row: H. O. Page, F. Steinbrecher, G. Buss (faculty representative), F. A. Paul, and G. S. Roberts; second row: M. J. Sunderland, J. J. Pegues, M. R. Cleary, and C. B. Roberts; first row: F. J. Collings.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
